identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Logistics with Cyberpunk aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'fast' and 'electric'.
Content is King: Data must be legible but beautiful.
Zoom In: Focus on the driver and the vehicle details.
Negative Space: Use deep black space to let neon accents pop.

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Big stats

grid_system.marketing: Bento Grid (Mode A) - Asymmetric, artistic, large gaps (gap-8).
grid_system.dashboard: High Density Grid (Mode B) - Tight (gap-4), 100% width utilization.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/unbounded' and '@fontsource/manrope' to package.json immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Neon Night Hauler' palette. Set 'zinc-950' as the default background.
3. FORCE DARK MODE: Ensure the 'dark' class is always applied to the html/body tag, or set default theme to dark in the provider.
4. USE SHADCN: Use Shadcn components for complex interactions (Forms, Dialogs, Selects) but STYLE them with the 'glass' and 'neon' tokens.
5. NO WHITE BACKGROUNDS: Never use pure white backgrounds. Use Zinc-900 or Zinc-950.
6. BILINGUAL: Ensure all text nodes are wrapped in translation keys (prepare for i18n).
7. MAPS: For the 'Search by City' feature, use a stylized dark map placeholder or 'react-map-gl' with a dark style if implementing fully.
8. FONDY: When implementing the payment modal, ensure it has a dark backdrop and doesn't flash white.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
